desc: We are Post 9/11 Veterans on the left. We are pro-vet, pro-political revolution, and anti-war. Your support helps us fight the military-industrial complex, American imperialism and the wholesale looting of the working class by corporations. War is a Racket.

layout.text:
We are Left Flank Vets
Capitalism runs on blood, and War is the top donor. We are a leftist, pro-political revolution, anti-war, and anti-MIC co-operative of Post 9/11 veterans. Your support helps us fight the Military Industrial Complex, American imperialism, and the wholesale looting of the working class by corporations.
